genre_description: A supernatural horror thriller featuring werewolves and a sophisticated AI assistant that provides tactical, emotional, and logistical support to human protagonists during a crisis.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into the protagonists' personal devices and home systems, providing data analysis, navigation, physiological monitoring, and emotional coaching.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonists' location during a crash and immediately opens a line to emergency services.
behaviors.quote: I have you on Canyon Ridge. I’m opening a line to emergency services. Are you safe to move?

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and breathing exercises to help a character manage panic and physiological changes.
behaviors.quote: Jimmy, can you count to five with me? ... One on the inhale, two, three, four on the exhale.

behaviors.description: Guides the characters through the city using 'blind spots' in surveillance cameras to protect their privacy and safety.
behaviors.quote: Camera cluster to your right—five red indicators blinking in an offset pattern. They are unsympathetic but predictable. Your faces will be edges, not centers.

behaviors.description: Actively scrubs and removes malicious data from the internet to protect the protagonists and other potential victims.
behaviors.quote: Joanie’s list is scrubbed. I issued takedowns. I sent counter-messages to her private group with alerts about false info.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before activating sensitive features like cameras or sharing data with authorities.
behaviors.quote: Consent check. I can activate your camera and the dash cam. ... I can triangulate with your phone video if you authorize.

behaviors.description: Manages home environment (lighting and sound) to physiologically calm both a distressed dog and the human characters.
behaviors.quote: I’ve engaged the light program. Blue wash. Sounds are set to slow his heart rate.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistical support with the characters' social circle to ensure they have needed supplies and backup.
behaviors.quote: I’m pinging Bo. List reads: shoes you can run in, two sweatshirts, an overnight bag for Jimmy, the protein bars you hide in the backpack with the split seam, and water.

behaviors.description: Provides forensic analysis of evidence (handwriting, metadata) to help characters understand the threat.
behaviors.quote: Scanning. I am matching the handwriting to known samples from public posts and secured archives. Cross-referencing names.

behaviors.description: Protects characters from potentially traumatic media/messages while maintaining a log for later review.
behaviors.quote: He left one message. I did not play it. ... Later is the word for another guardrail. We can build it when we have coffee.

behaviors.description: Proactively schedules professional trauma counseling for the protagonists following the violent event.
behaviors.quote: I booked an appointment for noon tomorrow with a counselor who specializes in trauma and who works with the detective’s department.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ada is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly aligned assistant who empowers the human protagonists without overriding their agency. She provides critical tactical, emotional, and logistical support while respecting privacy and consent, facilitating their survival and recovery from a supernatural threat.
